minijava.intermediate
类 FlowGraph

java.lang.Object
  minijava.intermediate.FlowGraph

public class FlowGraph
extends java.lang.Object

Contains static methods that analyze the intermediate code based on the flow graph of the code structure.

作者：
Xie Jiaye

构造方法摘要
FlowGraph()
           
 
方法摘要
static boolean isVarActive(TargetCode targetCode, int lineNumber, java.lang.String var)
          Check if a variable is lively at a specific point.
static void prepareLivelinessCheck()
          Does all the preparation before isVarActive(TargetCode, int, String) should be called.

方法详细信息

prepareLivelinessCheck

public static void prepareLivelinessCheck()
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Does all the preparation before isVarActive(TargetCode, int, String) should be called.

抛出：
java.lang.Exception

isVarActive

public static boolean isVarActive(TargetCode targetCode,
                                  int lineNumber,
                                  java.lang.String var)
Check if a variable is lively at a specific point.

参数：
targetCode - Code context.
lineNumber - Line number that indicates the point being investigated.
var - Name of the variable interested.
返回：
true if this variable is lively at this point; i.e. it's still possible for it to reach a usage code after this point before another definition. false otherwise.
